description: Franky House serves as the headquarters and residence of the Franky Family organization in Water 7. It's a large building where the dismantlers gather, party, and conduct their business of breaking down ships.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Confronts Franky Family
keyEvents.description: Usopp arrives at Franky House alone to demand the return of the 200 million berries stolen from him by the Franky Family.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Usopp attempts to prove his worth to the crew but is brutally beaten instead.

keyEvents.title: Franky Defeats Usopp
keyEvents.description: Inside Franky House, Franky easily defeats Usopp and mocks him before leaving with the stolen money.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Franky House as a dangerous location and the site of one of Usopp's most humiliating defeats.

keyEvents.title: Crew Finds Usopp Unconscious
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats discover Usopp passed out and bloody in front of Franky House, fueling their determination for revenge.
keyEvents.significance: The emotional discovery that triggers the crew's raid on the building.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Storm Franky House
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Zoro, Sanji, and Chopper charge into Franky House to confront the Franky Family and avenge Usopp.
keyEvents.significance: The location becomes the site of a major battle between the Straw Hats and the Franky Family.

keyEvents.title: Franky Family Defeated
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats completely overwhelm and defeat all Franky Family members present at their headquarters.
keyEvents.significance: The decisive battle establishes the Straw Hats' strength and marks the beginning of their complex relationship with the Franky Family.

statusHistory.reason: Franky House is operational as the headquarters of the Franky Family

description: Water 7 is a city in Paradise famous for its shipbuilding industry. Built on water with canals throughout, it's known as the City of Water and is home to the world's best shipwrights.

keyEvents.title: Following Blood Trail Through City
keyEvents.description: The crew follows Usopp's blood trail through the streets and canals of Water 7 to locate their injured friend.
keyEvents.significance: The city's layout and atmosphere contribute to the tension and urgency of finding Usopp.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Decides to Say Goodbye to Going Merry
keyEvents.description: While in Water 7, Luffy makes the painful decision that they must say goodbye to the Going Merry.
keyEvents.significance: Water 7 becomes the location where one of the crew's most difficult decisions is made.
